object.name: Collection
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema" i18n:domain="plone"> <schema> <field name="query" type="zope.schema.List"> <description i18n:translate="">Define the search terms for the items you want to list by choosing what to match on. The list of results will be dynamically updated</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="">Search terms</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Dict"> <key_type type="zope.schema.TextLine"/> </value_type> </field> <field name="sort_on" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description i18n:translate="">Sort the collection on this index</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="label_sort_on">Sort on</title> </field> <field name="sort_reversed" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description i18n:translate="">Sort the results in reversed order</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="label_sort_reversed">Reversed order</title> </field> <field name="limit" type="zope.schema.Int"> <default>1000</default> <description i18n:translate="">Limit Search Results</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="">Limit</title> </field> <field name="item_count" type="zope.schema.Int"> <default>30</default> <description i18n:translate="">Number of items that will show up in one batch.</description> <required>False</required> <title i18n:translate="label_item_count">Item count</title> </field> <fieldset name="filtro" label="Filtro"> <field name="filtro_conteudo" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Exibir filtro de conteúdo</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
